Container.Name: Weight-Tracker
Container.Overview:
A self-hosted mobile-first weight tracking application. Log your daily weight, track water consumption, monitor activity type and sleep quality, and visualize your progress with interactive charts.
Features: - Weight tracking with activity type and sleep quality - Water consumption tracking - Interactive progress charts with time filters - Multi-user support with admin and user roles - Customizable date formats and chart colors - Customizable activity

Config.Name: Config Path
Config.Description: Path to store application data (users, weight entries, settings)

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions (99 = nobody on Unraid)

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions (100 = users on Unraid)

Config.Name: API_KEY
Config.Description: Secret key for API authentication. Enables Home Assistant integration. Use X-API-User header to specify user. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32
